description: An app for viewing monitoring data

scripts.build:local: npm run build:dev && browserify js/index.js -t [ jstify --engine lodash ] > dist/bundle.js
scripts.build:local:es5: npm run build:dev && browserify js/index.js -t [ jstify --engine lodash] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015-without-strict ] ] > dist/bundle-es5.js && perl -pi -e "s/'use strict';//g" dist/bundle-es5.js
scripts.build:web: npm run build:dev && npm run build:js && npm run build:js:es5
scripts.build:chrome: copyup chrome/* dist && crx pack dist -o dist/mapfilter.crx
scripts.build:js: browserify js/index.js -t [ jstify --engine lodash ] | uglifyjs -mc > dist/bundle.js
scripts.build:js:es5: browserify js/index.js -t [ jstify --engine lodash ] -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015-without-strict ] ] | uglifyjs -mc > dist/bundle-es5.js && perl -pi -e "s/'use strict';//g" dist/bundle-es5.js
scripts.start: npm run build:dev && npm run dev | garnish
scripts.build:css: postcss --use postcss-import --use autoprefixer --use postcss-url --postcss-url.url inline css/index.css > dist/bundle.css
scripts.open: npm run build:dev && npm run dev | opnr | garnish
scripts.build:dev: copyfiles index.html dist && npm run build:css && npm run build:version
scripts.predeploy: npm run build:web && copyfiles CNAME dist

name: monitoring-app
